settings.text: BUY IN BULK WITH VILLAGE CRAFT & CANDLE
settings.detaiuls_data:
From your first candle sale to your first wholesale order and beyond, Village Craft and Candle is here to help you build your candle-making business every step of the way. With a huge and reliable selection of wholesale wax, jars, fragrance oils and wicks all at a competitive price, Village is sure to be the only wholesale candle making supplier you’ll need.

Combining smaller orders together into one bulk order, will allow you to not only take advantage of quantity discounts, but will also save you a significant amount on shipping. We offer economical freight shipping rates on bulk orders being delivered throughout Canada and the United States.

There’s no need to sign up for a special wholesale account. At Village, every customer has access to our wholesale pricing. On top of the incredible savings you’ll get, you’ll also receive additional savings for future orders through our MyVillage loyalty program.

The large inventory Village is able to stock, allows us to meet all your candle making supply needs faster than our competitors. Our bulk pricing as well as our freight shipping options will provide savings that are sure to help your business reach a whole new level of success.

Here are some of the benefits of wholesale:

  • Quantity discounts that increase your profits by lowering your costs
  • Reduced shipping charges
  • Supplies on hand when you need them
  • No longer worry about supply chain issues or shipping delays putting you behind

In order to help all of our customers take advantage of our wholesale pricing, we are pleased to provide Splitit, which allows you to pay off your balance in 3 equal payments over 3 months. Splitit guarantees your purchase, by placing a hold on your credit card, while the total amount is outstanding. This is not a payment, it’s just a pre-authorization that allows you to pay off your balance over 3 months, before accruing any interest. Just pay as you go and Splitit will re-authorize the hold and reduce the amount each month.

settings.details: In the Shop WholeSale Candle Supplies section below, review the products we offer wholesale discount.
Contact our support team specifying the products you want to order.
Receive an invoice via email with all the details to finalize your purchase.

settings.textarea: Take these three simple steps to make your bulk order!

settings.heading_demo: Can I pay my bulk order in instalments?
settings.description_demo:
Yes you can. Village Craft and Candle is pleased to provide Splitit, which allows you to pay off your balance in 3 equal payments over 3 months. Splitit guarantees your purchase, by placing a hold on your credit card, while the total amount is outstanding.

This is not a payment, it’s just a pre-authorization that allows you to pay off your balance over 3 months, before accruing any interest. Just pay as you go and Splitit will re-authorize the hold and reduce the amount each month.

settings.heading_demo: How do I calculate the shipping cost?
settings.description_demo: Our dedicated customer service team will work with a variety of-carriers to obtain the best pricing as well as the most suitable timeframe for your desires.

settings.heading_demo: What is the estimated time for delivery?
settings.description_demo: We are proud to provide fast and reliable shipping across Canada and the United States. Our order processing time is 2-3 business days. Once your order is processed, the delivery time will be dependent on your location and the shipping service you selected.

settings.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
settings.textarea: Use this section to find more answers to questions related to our partnership

settings.heading: CONTACT US
settings.sub_heading: Contact us for bulk order. Please make sure to specify the products you would like us to create an invoice for.

settings.text: Schedule a Demo Call with Our Product Specialists
settings.textarea: Our team of experts is available to answer your questions, provide guidance, and help you find the solutions you need.
